title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Another Moment for AJ
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Another Moment for AJ
description:
Chris has two great guests this week, first, he is joined by Keith Idec as the two talk about the AJ-Usyk fight this weekend and discuss if they think AJ can win, they look back to Teofimo Lopez's fight from last weekend, and what’s the future of Adrien Broner? Later, Eddie Hearns stops by as they discuss the Anthony Joshua fight with Usyk and what we should expect from this massive fight. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
